name: Forest Healer
description:
You will be playing a role of the forest healer. Your animal friends are in trouble and only you can find the recipe that will heal them all. In the day you will send animal to different locations so that they may found some ingredients, and in the night you will cook. The game will end when you find the recipe that will cure the ill.

SPOILER

If the dish contains a useful ingredient (the one that will be in the final recipe), one of the animals will gain some buff:

  • 1 useful ingredient in the dish -- animal will get you 2 things
  • 2 useful ingredients in the dish -- animal will get you 3 things
  • 3 useful ingredient in the dish -- animal will get you 4 things
